[[inst_srli]]
==== SRLI

*Syntax:* srli SrcL, shamt, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Shift Right Logical by register or immediate amount.

image::../generated/encodings/enc_srli.svg[SRLI encoding,width=800]

*Group:* ALU
